text: Gumazamizir otuegh gavgavigh, mangɨ Isipɨn ikiamiba, me bar arɨghiregham. Apaniba taraziv sueghtɨ me arɨghiram, eghtɨ tarazi dagheba puvatɨgh arɨmɨghiregham, eghtɨ tarazi arɨmariar kuram iniva arɨmɨghiram. Kɨ bizir kurar kabar amutɨ, da me bativtɨ, men adarazi bar gɨvaghtɨ, men ikiavɨra itir varazira, ua ikian kogham.
